warnings.message: LWC1034: Ambiguous attribute value foo="{bar}". If you want to make it a valid identifier you should remove the surrounding quotes foo={bar}. If you want to make it a string you should escape it foo="\{bar}".

LWC1034: Ambiguous attribute value title="{adjacent}". If you want to make it a valid identifier you should remove the surrounding quotes title={adjacent}. If you want to make it a string you should escape it title="\{adjacent}".

LWC1034: Ambiguous attribute value class="{space}". If you want to make it a valid identifier you should remove the surrounding quotes class={space}. If you want to make it a string you should escape it class="\{space}".
